import createStore from"unistore";import axios from"axios";// Initiate new store state
var initState={listTopNews:[],listEverything:[],isLoading:true,apiKey:"293e5a8d202a42f788880487d3bc4c2e",baseUrl:"https://newsapi.org/v2/"};export var store=createStore(initState);export var actions=function actions(store){return{// Define everything function for listnews everything
everything:function everything(state,event){var urlEverything=state.baseUrl+"everything?domains=wsj.com,nytimes.com&apiKey="+state.apiKey;var self=store;axios.get(urlEverything).then(function(response){self.setState({listEverything:response.data.articles,isLoading:false});// handle success
console.log(response.data);}).catch(function(error){self.setState({isLoading:false});// handle error
console.log(error);});},// Define topArticle function for listnews top headlines
topArticle:function topArticle(state,event){var urlHeadline=state.baseUrl+"top-headlines?country=us&pageSize=5&apiKey="+state.apiKey;var self=store;axios.get(urlHeadline).then(function(response){self.setState({listTopNews:response.data.articles,isLoading:false});// handle success
console.log(response.data);}).catch(function(error){self.setState({isLoading:false});// handle error
console.log(error);});}};};
